thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com
thread.title: Jennifer S.

author: Jennifer S.
title: Jennifer S.
text: I really love the Salar Capri and Salar Crop. However, you are frequently out of the various fabrics/prints in these styles. Also, each print should say what colors are in the print. For example, I can't tell if a dark color in one of the Salar florals is navy or black. So, I don't know which color tank top to get to match it. You should say something like, "matches our XYZ tank top in midnight, coral, and navy."
